title: (x) Darrell Hardy Construction - horrid serif font - Book Jacket Italic {Mike Y}
content:
Hi folks! I have to redraw a logo featuring what I think is a truly hideous serif font. The "CONSTRUCTION" looks like it's been artificially italicized, but it's hard to tell.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100325024530im_/http:/typophile.com/files/trace_5499.jpg)

Any ideas?
author: iskippy227

comments.content:
This is Book Jacket Italic. It used to be an old Image Club font, from the days when they were independent. I have the font on one of their old Letterpress CDs. I think there are sites you can find it on the web too.

- Mike Yanega
